DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigator study evaluate whether alpha-blocker terazosin anti-cholinergics tolterodine relieve DJ-stent related symptom .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Terazosin Tolterodine Ureteral Stent Related Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Ureteral stent ( US ) essential tool urologist 's surgery useful instrument indication increase due new stent technology improvement patient 's comfort . US associate discomfort complication include low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) frequency , urgency , dysuria , incomplete emptying , flank suprapubic 's pain , incontinence , hematuria , movement stent , infection encrustation stent . US related symptom LUTS due benign prostate hyperplasia overactive bladder relieve alpha-blocker anticholinergic . The purpose study investigate effect terazosin tolterodine lonely together comparison placebo US relate symptom . The investigator study do prospectively . The patient underwent indwell Double-j stent distribute four group : 1 ) receive placebo 2 ) receive terazosin 2mg twice 3 ) receive tolterodine 2mg daily 4 ) receive terazosin 2mg twice tolterodine 2mg daily . All patient receive prophylactic antibiotic demand analgesic . After entrance study , fulfill International Prostatic Symptoms Score ( IPSS ) Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) indwell US , two week indwell US US removal time , investigator evaluate drug 's effect US relate symptom .
DOC.criteria: If patient meet exclusion criterion undergone doubleJ stent indwelling . 1 . Prior history pelvic surgery 2 . Prior history Transurethral Resection either Prostate Bladder Tumor 3 . Benign prostate hyperplasia 4 . Recent recurrent urinary tract infection 5 . Chronic medication betablockers Anticholinergic 6 . Pregnancy 7 . Prostatitis 8 . Prostate cancer 9 . Bilateral ureteroscopy ureteral stenting 10 . Age < 18 > 55 11 . Stone size > 20 mm 12 . Diabetes 13 . Bladder Outlet Obstruction
